page.title: 14Sports day
page.content: Sports day is very popular at Brinsley school.Every year the children look forward to it because they don't have to do any work at all! They are all different kinds of races,from serious running races to lots of fun events,involving dressing up and clowning around.All our mums and dads come to watch.The school children are divided into four teams;red,yellow,green and blue.This year the main event was the fourth year sprint because two of our fastest runners were racing against each other.The atmosphere was electric!Everyone really enjoys sports day :the fun,the exitement and especially the afternoon off school!
